text: 🚨 Energy War Alert! 🚨Former oil boss warns of price rises after Ukraine infrastructure attacks. 💥 The destruction of Ukrainian energy infrastructure by Russia will lead to a dramatic rise in European energy prices, Andriy Kobolyev, former CEO of Ukraine's state-owned oil company, has warned. 💰 If European energy markets start to believe the Russians are winning this war, it will have a dramatic negative effect on energy prices. 🔥 The recent strike on Ukraine's gas storage facilities in the west of the country caused a significant spike in European gas prices, as these facilities are still operational and used by European gas traders. 💡 Kobolyev emphasizes that the damage being inflicted on Ukraine's energy network is far more extensive than Russian attacks in the winter of 2022-23. 🌪️ The war on energy infrastructure must be stopped! 🛑 We need to act now to prevent a devastating impact on European energy markets and ensure a stable energy supply for all.
